mapper.select: SELECT ed_table_field.Id AS id, ed_table_field.table_name AS tableName, ed_table_field.field_name AS fieldName, ed_table_field.template_id AS templateId, ed_table_field.type, ed_table_field.field_type AS fieldType, ed_field_value.`value`, ed_tools.id AS toolId, ed_tools.`name` AS toolName, ed_foreign_key.field AS foreignField, ed_foreign_key.table_name AS foreignTableName FROM `ed_table_field` LEFT JOIN ed_field_value ON ed_table_field.Id = ed_field_value.tableField_id LEFT JOIN ed_field_generator ON ed_table_field.Id = ed_field_generator.tableField_id LEFT JOIN ed_tools ON ed_field_generator.tool_id = ed_tools.id LEFT JOIN ed_foreign_key ON ed_table_field.Id = ed_foreign_key.tableField_id LEFT JOIN ed_template ON ed_table_field.template_id = ed_template.id WHERE ed_template.id = #{templateId}
